fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Pass a law forbidding an action.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player suspects someone of breaking a law, they may report it to the host. If it is true, the suspect is modkilled and banned. If it is false, the player loses reporting permissions.
- The host has the right to bar ridiculously stupid and/or broken laws from being passed.
